articles.title: Maharashtra reports 3,959 fresh cases of COVID-19 - All India Radio
articles.description: Maharashtra today reported 3,959 fresh COVID-19 cases, taking the total count to 17,14,273. With 150 fatalities, the cumulative toll in the state climbed to 45,115.

articles.title: This nasal spray might be able to block coronavirus infections - BGR
